article.title: Lockheed to Provide AH-64D Target Acquisition and Night Vision
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Missiles and Fire Control, Orlando, Florida, was awarded a $163,700,048 firm-fixed-price and cost-plus-fixed-fee contract. The award will provide for the modification of an existing contract to procure AH-64D Apache modernized target acquisition designation sight/pilot's night vision sensor. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
